title: Region
description: An implicit region defined relative to an ellipsoid that is centered at the local space origin.

semiMajorAxisRadius.description: The radius along the semi-major axis of the reference ellipsoid in meters.

semiMinorAxisRadius.description: The radius along the semi-minor axis of the reference ellipsoid in meters.

heightFromSurface.description: The height of this region from the surface of the reference ellipsoid in meters.

slice.description: The optionally-defined slice of the region.
